title: shohag999
author: shohag999
content: Can anyone tell me how I can gain merit from bitcointalk.I am a old user but I have 0 merit

comments.author: Iron Fist
comments.body: Isn't that obvious? You get merit when you contribute something positive.I mean, if you take a look at your posting style, it should be quite evident why others might not see your contributions as merit-worthy. Or did you have a different idea of what "merits" were all about?

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: You've spammed over a thousand posts. The fact that you haven't received any Merit confirms the system is working.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: Be like the entrepreneurs who strives to offer people's demands with problem solving and a marketing strategy Â by being technically creative and making admirable interesting (quality-post).

comments.author: shohag999
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on September 25, 2023, 09:22:46 PMYou've spammed over a thousand posts. The fact that you haven't received any Merit confirms the system is working. I joined many bounty not spammed.I need merit for junior member.anybody please help me.
